
new_icon <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = 'ios-close',
  iconColor = 'black',
  library = 'ion',
  markerColor = "red"
)

content <- paste(sep = "<br/>",
                 "<b>Hitech City</b>",
                 "Madapur",
                 "Hyderabad"
)

my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(lat = 17.4477532, lng = 78.3677646,
                    icon = new_icon,  
                    popup = "The IT HUB") %>%
  addPopups(lat = 17.4477532, lng = 78.3677646, content,
            options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  )
my_map
